strings.string: Hello! I’m Tommy!
And I’m Tallulah! Welcome to Tickety Town! It’s almost Chime Time!
That’s when we chime in the time! But we need to hurry to the Clockhouse so we get there in time!
And we need to collect Cogs along the way so McCoggins can fix the clock! Will you help us?
Let’s go!
I really can’t believe it! I can’t reach that huge carrot! I need more springs to help me jump even higher!
Hey Hopparoo! Do you need some help to reach that carrot?
We can find some springs for you!
Badoing! That would be great! To reach that carrot, I need to find 2 green springs, 3 yellow springs and 4 blue springs.
I’m sure we can find them … and make it it back before Chime Time!
And if you’re sure Tommy, then I’m sure!
And I’m sure if you’re sure! Let’s go!
Use the left and right arrows on your keyboard to make us run!
To go back, press the left arrow key.
To move forward, press the right arrow key.
To jump, press the Space Bar.
When you see the things we need, help us run over to them to collect them.
And remember, if you see Cogs along the way, collect them.. McCoggins needs them to fix the clock for Chime Time!
And keep your eye out for stars too – they’ll make us run faster.
Are you ready?
Let’s go!
Remember, to help Hopperoo reach his carrot, we need to collect 2 green springs, 3 yellow springs and 4 blue springs.
Oh, and watch out for the Spring Chicks! If we bump into them, we’ll drop what we collected! We need to jump over the Spring Chicks! Easy peasy... Lemon squeezy!
Badoing! I made it! Thanks for your help finding the springs! Hooray! You can’t stop the hop!
Tommy! Tallulah! Moo-hoo!
Did you hear that, Tommy?
We’re coming Madame Au Lait!
Hello Madame Au Lait!

Hello, my little Tick Tocketeers! I need your help! I need to bake my special Oaty Cake before Chime Time, but I can’t find the ingredients! I need one jar of honey, two bottles of milk, three packs of oats and four bunches of berries!
Don’t worry Madame Au Lait! We’ll find them! Easy peasy…
Tick toc cheesy!
Let’s go!
Mooo-ray! My special Oaty Cake is ready! Thank you my little chime-timers! I couldn’t have made it without you!
You’re welcome Madame Au Lait!
You can have a slice if you like!
Thanks, Madame Au Lait! Right after Chime Time...
What a tickety pickle!
It sounds like we better hurry so we can help McCoggins fix that clock!
Let’s go! Bye, Madame Au Lait!
Hello McCoggins!
We found the cogs, so you can fix the clock for Chime Time!
But … but … but I’ve lost all the tools from my toolbox. I need them to fix the clock, or there’ll be no Chime Time!
Tallulah, are you thinking what I’m thinking?
Uh-uh! McCoggins, we’ll find the missing tools for you!
Oh thank you, thank you! I need to find 3 green hammers, 4 blue screwdrivers and 5 orange wrenches!
Let’s find the tools for McCoggins!
Tommy, Tallulah, thank you for helping me find all my missing tools! And you collected a lot of cogs! Great! Now I can use the tools and the cogs you collected to fix the clock for Chime Time!
Tickety-tastic!
Now the clock is ready for Chime Time!
Come on Tallulah! It’s almost Chime Time!
We made it in time for Chime Time!
Thank you for helping us!
Click the green play again button to play again!
Click the blue print button to print your own Tickety Toc activity page!
